test_cases.test_name: Verification of Analytical Balance Data Collection via RS-232
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly collects data from analytical balances using standard RS-232 interfaces as specified in URS-LAB-002.
prerequisites: Analytical balance connected via RS-232
Data collection software installed and configured
Test weights available for balance verification

test_steps.action: Connect the analytical balance to the system using the vendor's standard RS-232 interface.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects the analytical balance and establishes communication.

test_steps.action: Place a known test weight on the balance and initiate data collection.
test_steps.expected_result: System records the weight measurement within the expected tolerance range.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is stored in the vendor's standard database format.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is correctly stored and retrievable from the database.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully collects and stores data from the analytical balance.
Data is within the expected tolerance range for the test weight.
Data is stored in the correct database format.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for data integrity
GAMP Category 3 requirements for standard software
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete
Data must be stored with proper timestamps

test_cases.test_name: Verification of pH Meter Interface and Data Collection
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly interfaces with pH meters using standard communication protocols as specified in URS-LAB-003.
prerequisites: pH meter connected via standard communication protocol
Data collection software installed and configured
Calibrated pH buffer solutions available

test_steps.action: Connect the pH meter to the system using the vendor's standard communication protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects the pH meter and establishes communication.

test_steps.action: Immerse the pH meter in a known buffer solution and initiate data collection.
test_steps.expected_result: System records the pH measurement within the expected tolerance range.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is displayed in real-time on the standard dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is displayed within 5 seconds of measurement.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully collects and displays data from the pH meter.
Data is within the expected tolerance range for the buffer solution.
Real-time display updates within 5 seconds.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for data integrity
GAMP Category 3 requirements for standard software
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete
Data must be displayed in real-time as specified

test_cases.test_name: Verify Data Collection from Analytical Balances
test_cases.objective: To verify that the system correctly collects data from analytical balances using the vendor's standard RS-232 interfaces.
prerequisites: Analytical balance connected via RS-232
Commercial data collection software installed

test_steps.action: Connect the analytical balance to the system using the RS-232 interface.
test_steps.expected_result: The system recognizes the analytical balance and establishes a connection.

test_steps.action: Perform a measurement on the analytical balance.
test_steps.expected_result: The system collects the measurement data and displays it in real-time.

acceptance_criteria: Data is collected and displayed correctly
Connection is stable
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data is not altered during transmission

test_cases.objective: To verify that the system correctly interfaces with pH meters using standard communication protocols.
prerequisites: pH meter connected
Commercial data collection software installed

test_steps.action: Connect the pH meter to the system using the standard communication protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: The system recognizes the pH meter and establishes a connection.

test_steps.action: Perform a pH measurement using the pH meter.
test_steps.expected_result: The system collects the pH measurement data and displays it in real-time.

acceptance_criteria: Data is collected and displayed correctly
Connection is stable
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data is not altered during transmission

test_cases.test_name: Verification of Standard RS-232 Interface for Analytical Balances
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly collects data from analytical balances using the vendor's standard RS-232 interfaces.
prerequisites: Analytical balance connected via RS-232
Data collection software installed and configured

test_steps.action: Connect the analytical balance to the system using the RS-232 interface.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects the analytical balance and establishes communication.

test_steps.action: Perform a weight measurement on the analytical balance.
test_steps.expected_result: System records the measurement data accurately.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is stored in the vendor's standard database format.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is stored correctly and can be retrieved.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully collects and stores data from the analytical balance.
Data integrity is maintained throughout the process.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete

test_cases.test_name: Validation of Real-Time Instrument Status Display
test_cases.objective: Validate that the system displays real-time instrument status updates within the specified 5-second refresh rate.
prerequisites: Connected pH meter and dissolution testing equipment
Dashboard view configured in the system

test_steps.action: Initiate data collection from the pH meter and dissolution testing equipment.
test_steps.expected_result: System begins collecting data and displays initial status.

test_steps.action: Change the instrument status (e.g., start a dissolution test).
test_steps.expected_result: System updates the dashboard view within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify the historical data log reflects the status change.
test_steps.expected_result: Log entry is created with the correct timestamp and status.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard updates within 5 seconds of status change.
Historical log accurately records status changes.

test_cases.test_name: Data Collection from Analytical Balances via RS-232
test_cases.objective: Verify the system correctly collects and stores data from analytical balances using standard RS-232 interfaces.
prerequisites: Analytical balance connected via RS-232
Data collection software installed and configured

test_steps.action: Connect the analytical balance to the system using the RS-232 interface.
test_steps.expected_result: System recognizes the analytical balance and establishes communication.

test_steps.action: Perform a measurement on the analytical balance.
test_steps.expected_result: Measurement data is displayed in the system's real-time dashboard.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is stored in the vendor's standard database format.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is stored correctly and can be retrieved for reporting.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully collects and stores data from the analytical balance.
Data is displayed in real-time and stored correctly.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for data integrity
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: Ensure the system updates real-time instrument status displays within the specified 5-second refresh rate.
prerequisites: Connected pH meter and dissolution testing equipment
Real-time dashboard configured

test_steps.action: Initiate a measurement on the pH meter.
test_steps.expected_result: Measurement data appears in the real-time dashboard within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Start a dissolution test on the dissolution equipment.
test_steps.expected_result: Test status updates in the dashboard within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify the dashboard updates for both instruments simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: Both instruments' statuses are updated within the 5-second window.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time dashboard updates within 5 seconds for all connected instruments.
Multiple instrument statuses are updated simultaneously.

test_cases.test_name: Standard RS-232 Interface Verification for Analytical Balances
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly collects data from analytical balances using the vendor's standard RS-232 interfaces.
prerequisites: Analytical balance connected via RS-232
Data collection software installed and configured

test_steps.action: Connect the analytical balance to the system using the RS-232 interface.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects the analytical balance and establishes communication.

test_steps.action: Perform a measurement on the analytical balance.
test_steps.expected_result: System collects and displays the measurement data in real-time.

test_steps.action: Verify the data is stored in the vendor's standard database format.
test_steps.expected_result: Measurement data is correctly stored and retrievable from the database.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully collects and stores data from the analytical balance.
Data is displayed in real-time and stored correctly.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for electronic records
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system displays real-time instrument status updates within the specified 5-second refresh rate.
prerequisites: Multiple instruments connected to the system
Dashboard view configured

test_steps.action: Connect at least 5 instruments to the system (e.g., balances, pH meters, ovens).
test_steps.expected_result: All instruments are detected and displayed on the dashboard.

test_steps.action: Monitor the dashboard for real-time status updates.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates instrument status within 5 seconds of any change.

test_steps.action: Simulate a status change (e.g., turn off an oven).
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard reflects the status change within 5 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard updates instrument status within 5 seconds.
All connected instruments are displayed correctly.
